name: Update firmware

recommendedActions: If the interconnect is in Configured, Maintenance or Configuration error state, try the firmware update again. If the interconnect is in any other state, refresh the enclosure and then retry the firmware update. If the problem continues to occur, perform a reset (soft) on the interconnects and retry the firmware update. If the problem still persists, contact your authorized support representative and provide a support dump.

taskStatus: Unable to stage the firmware on interconnect CZJ9260730, interconnect 4.
